website_summaries.verdict: Great sound from an inexpensive headphone set. When comfort and sound quality come together like this, it's a solid pick.
pros: Excellent sound quality and noise cancellation
Flexible, nylon-wrapped cord withstands rough use

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones!!! Outside of my beats Bluetooth these are the best sound quality I have had. I've even had others ask if they were beats. Perfect for my time at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Brown

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR DURABILITY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 15 year old son. the one ear cushion fell off and we have tried multiple times to put it back on. On the other side, the hinge where it folds broke in his hands. I purchased a warranty through square trade and was told that it doesn't cover accidental damage. I think having it fall apart in your hands doesn't really qualify for accidental damage, it is poor manufacturing. I will call the warranty company to talk to them about the online decision but I will not purchase any more headphones from this company.
customer_reviews.author: gfcf momma

customer_reviews.title: Rugged construction but limited controls
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed, and have a nice, braided cable. My 5 year olds can be brutal on equipment. You could ask the last headphones, but... they're no longer with us. So when these weathered a cross-country trip being jammed in backpacks, seat back pockets, and drug through the wilderness, and came out looking like new. I thought I'd pass my experience on. DO NOTE however that they are not noise limiting, and they do not have volume functionality in the in-line controller (it's just for mic functions). Also, for those asking if it works with a computer, it will but you probably need a splitter like this one:
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! By far the best headphones I have found ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! By far the best headphones I have found for my young daughter. Many headsets marketed for kids, regardless of how much I have spent, have been terrible. I wanted a durable set that did not have limited volume (I can limit it on the device if need be) and a set that could be sized small enough to fit a four year. Also, comfy! We travel a lot and she really MUST wear them.These fit my four year old but can also be adjusted to fit my teen and also myself. My little one loves them and they seem quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Browning

customer_reviews.title: Sad. Guess I'll have to order a new pair ...
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 months of (not even daily use) these are already not working from the one side. Sad. Guess I'll have to order a new pair from another manufacturer. Sound was great though, wish they would've lasted longer
customer_reviews.author: bubblezcasto

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old just loves these!! So I gave them a try too..... Comfortable to wear, ear part blocks out external noise very well and delivers crisp clear intenal sound. The ear parts conveniently collapse for easy transport in a backpack. They seem to be made of durable material, though we haven't had them long enough to be sure. In any event, there is a one year warranty. The actual color was exactly as it appreared on our screen. This was definitely good value for money. We are very pleased with this purchase and have already recommended to other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron

customer_reviews.title: Kids on Plane and for Children's Fire Tablets
customer_reviews.text: Worked excellently for two 6 yr olds on a cross-country plane trip who had Fire Tablets - also plugged into Delta jacks on plane just fine. Have continued to work great 5 months later. Purple and Pink colors were a dream come true for two girls. Well designed and high quality product for reasonable price. Saw adults on plane with same headphones, so size is very adaptable. We adjusted them to be as small as possible. Don't know if I'd go with them for children any younger due to sizing fit, but if they fit - great product.
customer_reviews.author: NYSportsFan

customer_reviews.title: High quality for "kids" headphones
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at the quality of these headphones. I plugged them into my iPhone to test the sound and was impressed with the audio quality. Deep bass and great sound reproduction. Other kid headphones I've tried at the $19 range had poor sound quality and flimsy materials. These headphones are sturdy and the cord feels durable. Unlike cheaper headphones, the cable is a single wire vs cheaper headphones where the cable split near the middle to feed the left/right channels.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalBrad

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these at the beginning of the school year as part of my daughter's school supplies. The ear piece broke within 3 months of light use and after a home repair have now broken again. They didn't survive one school year (used 1-3x per week). These are cute, but the quality is terrible. We use Philips over ear headphones for our kids while traveling. They are durable and fit our 6/9 year old's heads. Will be buying those to replace this crummy pair.
customer_reviews.author: MamaJoy

customer_reviews.title: Can't use when moving
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these I have purchased. First pair were good, daughter took to school and she has used on computer in class. Got another pair after christmas, sound cuts in and out as I move. Can't use them so good if you Are going to sit still but not for any other activity Really was a waste of money. Maybe I just got a bad pair.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Fits my toddler
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for headphones that would fit my petite toddler. She's quite small for a 3 year old so I wanted something that would stay on her head without slipping off all the time. These headphones fit the bill and she loves them. They are very comfortable and she doesn't complain wearing them at all. The sound is good and they have withstood the dropping, sitting on them and tripping over them and landing on top of them from the toddler and they still look as good as new. Highly recommend this product for the toddler years.
customer_reviews.author: H. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money paid
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two pair for my elementary school age grandchildren. Plug-and-play like all headsets should be — and the microphone was at a good level on the cord for them to use. They are not totally noise cancelling, as expected (if you want noise cancelling spend more money), however, cut enough outside noise out that they can concentrate on their remote learning classes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: These Headphones Last!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for my autistic son's birthday in early Sept. So far they are going strong. And the cord does not tangle up. Mind you, he is rough on headphones. I was buying him $5 and $10 ones but the ear cuffs would fall off with in a week. He also tosses them in a tote bag loaded with markers and note books. They always pull right out . The cheaper ones would always get tangled on anything he had in his bag. These headphones are great. I have bought two more for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 12 year old daughter. They fit perfectly. The sides are adjustable so you can make them longer if needed. She says they're very comfortable and she said that the sou d is great. As for noise cancellation, I believe it works well because when I try to talk to her she cannot hear me at all lol. I have to tap her to get her attention. Theses are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: GlossyNova

customer_reviews.title: I tried them out over the weekend and loved them. Light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair for my son to use at school because of the price. I tried them out over the weekend and loved them. Light, Comfortable, compact, and block out background nose. These are perfect for travel as they fold up small. I purchased a second, third and fourth pair and they fit everyone. They may market them for kids but don't be fooled they fit adults, and the sound quality for the price is AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: The Carl

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have great sound and comfort. That being said, I am a bit disappointed in the quality of the headphones I bought. I purchased them at the end of April (one month ago) and the ear muff on one side has already fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: Randa Celley

customer_reviews.title: These Headphones Last!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. My autistic son loves them. They are tangle free. They don't knot up. The sound is great and they last a long time compared to other headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old headphones. The old ones broke at the headband so were still usable. These Artix are amazing. I thought my inexpensive TV just had bad audio. Then I put on the Artix headphones and had to reduce the volume from a setting of 90 to a setting of 30 - that's how much clearer the sound is. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fay E. Slater

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for Kids
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our Toyota Sienna for our Children. We had other units before that fell apart within a matter of a month. these units are approaching one year old and spend their time in the Sienna, 24/7/365. So they have been in all temperatures. They have held up well and continue to perform above expectation.
customer_reviews.author: David B Leach II

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. We would prefer the ear pieces to be a little bigger to cover the entire ear. They get uncomfortable after a bit. Sound is good and price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: Beck L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value in a basic set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Not a heavy or demanding user, but they work fine with my laptop. Have not owned them long enough to pass on how they hold up. Good value for the price. They are comfortable. I have not tried to use them in a variety of uses. I like the braided cord and the overall construction seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: IT HURTS!! Super long cable!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the sound is good, but the cable is soooo long, yes I wanted a cable I'm old school but it can reach the floor. Worst part is it hurts, is very tight and it hurts your ears after a short while. Can't return I already tossed the box....I'm dissatisfied because I really love the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: CutieChefP

customer_reviews.title: The sound was clear and a good volume to hear well and not so loud the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son Ordered these to use in his classroom for third grade. The sound was clear and a good volume to hear well and not so loud the kids will loose their hearing! I didn't see a button to adjust the volume so it's set as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: I did like them until they broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these for my kids for school. One pair did not last a year before the earpiece fell off. I contacted the company because of the warranty. I was told this was considered physical damage and was not covered. Because these are kids headphones I would expect them to last with school use for more than a year. I did like them until they broke. The second pair had been good so far. I need another pair for my daughter but I am not sure if I want to invest in this brand if they cannot guarantee their product for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a Christmas present and 5 months later with minimal use they stopped working properly. Sound is very muffled and has some kind of tin can reverb sound. Tried on different devices with the same effect. If they are still under warranty and get replaced I will change the review. Edit: Merchant contacted us and replaced product. Moving to a 4 star review unless these break in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie B.

customer_reviews.title: A winning choice and top-notch customers service
customer_reviews.text: The Artix Headphones are ideal for my pre-teen. The headphones sound great, look good and are more comfortable to wear than in-ear headphones he previously tried. The cord is ideal for those who may be a little tougher on their headphones than others. Also noteworthy is 7thContinent’s customer service. After months of use, we encountered a problem with one of the ear flaps (lost the pin/dowel that connects it to the headset). When I inquired about a replacement part, their response was quick and resolution exceeded my expectation. They kindly replaced the headphones. Much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Full Quality Sound (From Bass to Treble)!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids to have at school (they are required to have headphones). I'm and audiophile guy so I had to give them a good "one over" to see if they were adequate for the task. I was shocked as to how good they sounded. The bass is usually lacking on low cost headphones and the mid-range typically sounds pour but, not these. I even A/B'd them with a pair of ATH-M50x headphones ($150 Audio Technica's) and they kept up nicely. As for durability, I can't say (haven't even had them a week). If we have and problems I'll report back. First impression: these are a great deal and the sound is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: I think these headphones are pretty cheap. Which is a bummer because I really ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product almost 2 weeks ago now and they've already broken. The arm between the head band and ear muff just snapped while putting them on. I think these headphones are pretty cheap. Which is a bummer because I really liked the pair I had previously from this same company.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkpoo

customer_reviews.title: Fits adult and 4 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I actually used it while traveling on a 15+ hours flight. It us for my 4 yr old son, but the headset is adjustable! For the price, the quality is pretty good. And it fits my 4 year olds head after we adjusted it. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: Broken :-/
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these but the tip of the jack portion broke off after just 4 months of use. My daughter uses these in her kindergarten classroom and they were sent home with a note asking us to replace them. I can't seem to find who to speak with regarding a replacement. So, if anyone from Artix sees this, please reach out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda & John C

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've bought plenty of headphones but these are awesome! Bought them for a grandson who likes to play on the tablet while traveling and Gram does not want to listen to Thomas the Train. These worked perfectly (so much so that the other grandson wanted to wear them as well!
customer_reviews.author: M. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Rip-off
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair we’ve purchased. Both lasted less than 6 months. Don’t want to spend a lot of kids headphones but buying them cheap ones every few months is silly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mena

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Headphones, Happy Daughter
customer_reviews.text: My 10-year old daughter LOVES these headphones. She needed them for school. They fit her perfectly and she is pleased with the sound quality and comfort. It has only been a few days, but they have withstood the challenges of backpack transport. She says all of her classmates admire them too.
customer_reviews.author: KWB

customer_reviews.title: They fit him great, and cancel out outside noise
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 8 year old to do computer work for homeschool. They fit him great, and cancel out outside noise. They’re comfortable and high quality. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Kate S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wear these headphones for my Fire Tablet, when I am outside in the yard or out walking. I only used the off button two or three times before it stopped working. This feature would be very helpful to me and is the particular reason I purchased these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Donna F.

customer_reviews.title: The colors are great. The fit and feel are good enough
customer_reviews.text: These are an OK set of headphones. Our kids use them when plugged into a laptop or on the digital piano. They may not stand up to kid use very well. We had an earphone break off after a couple months. The colors are great. The fit and feel are good enough.
customer_reviews.author: MG541

customer_reviews.title: The headphones are pretty nice until they're not but Artix customer service is very helpful
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this item twice. The first time one of the ear pieces snapped off. The second time one of the ear cushions fell off. Update: Artix customer service read my review and reached out to help solve the problem. I have added two stars to reflect their excellent customer service. They will be shipping a new set of headphones to us. If we have better luck with the new headphones, I will update my review again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Outside Sound Out
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Keeps all the outside sound out, which is annoying to me because when he is wearing these while playing with his iPad, he can never hear me when I am calling him. Fits a 9-year-old perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M-R

customer_reviews.title: I am surprisingly happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am surprisingly happy with my purchase. I had a pair of Dre Beats that my 2 puppies used as a chew toy! So I needed a cheap replacement to get me through their chewing phase. The quality and sound are awesome for the price, I miss the bass from my Dre Beats but these are very good and probably better for my hearing in the long run. I especially love the colors! Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Shorted out after 3 and a 1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. My daughter had these headphones for 3 1/2 months and they shorted out. 3 1/2 months... and not used everyday. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And I love that I can't hear the video he's watching
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. And I love that I can't hear the video he's watching. The ear pad has come loose a couple of times, but they've designed this so you can pull the plastic apart and easily tuck the padded portion back around it and tightly put it back together. Good design and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: These headphones stopped working in less than a month. There is no visible damage that I can see so it must be internal. My daughter didn’t tell me when they broke so I missed the window to return them. I did email the company direct but did not receive a reply. Update-The company emailed me and Replaced the earphones free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy W

customer_reviews.title: We love these headphones so much we bought more pairs
customer_reviews.text: We love these headphones so much we bought more pairs!!. My son chewed the cord of the ones he had at school & the 2nd ones (cord is fabric, no chewing througg thia one) we got on a lightning deal so even better!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kori h.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for school. They are comfortable, great padding and sound is great. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Mic Broke 9 days after receiving
customer_reviews.text: Received these on April 16th, and on April 25th the microphone piece broke. I bought these for the microphone and now they’re useless.
customer_reviews.author: R Williams

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased these for my 9 year old mainly for the great price but what i received i was definitely not expecting these are great quality,sound is amazing i find myself borrowing them from my son quite often and on top of that they ended up being compatible with our xbox one with the mic and everything so that amazed me because all the headphones i currently own don't work on the xbox i have been looking into getting a headset for gaming but have held off considering how pricey they are and im happy to say i will be ordering another set for myself consider me a very happy and loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer123

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Having just given these 5 stars, I have to say I haven't used them. But I bought them for my husband, and he's delighted with them. Now when he watches Netflix late into the night in bed next to me (on his Kindle Fire!), I'm not disturbed, so I'm delighted, too.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppermom

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply attached ear pads but not a bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8yr old's school supply list. He pulled the ear pads off before the school year even started. I couldn't quite figure out how to get it back on and finally managed it with a safety pin. The ear pads aren't connected well at all. They could've made that part better. I do like the cloth style cord, though.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Brazier

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this gift choice for my son.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son. Husband also tried them out. Both say the sound quality is very good. Son says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: norma

customer_reviews.title: I hated to purchase them
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were for my son (5 1/2). I hated to purchase them, but we had a few trips coming up this summer and this is going to really help maintain EVERYONE'S sanity. He LOVES the headphones, they seem durable and my husband (the sound engineer for my church) gave his thumbs up, so I guess I did alright!
customer_reviews.author: Penn’s Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone but a bit fragile button.
customer_reviews.text: The product works well but It seems the Mic or the button breaks of easily.
customer_reviews.author: Chibabe

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old went thru a few sets of cheap headphones and a set of nice ones. Well I guess I should have brought these a while ago and saved some money. These sound great and by no means look or feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: william h.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter. The color was vibrant and the material seems of good quality. My favorite part was the cord is braided and seems more flexible and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Caitie

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for children. The volume can be fairy low while providing hearing protection, with quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Will Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! I love the padded ear pieces and works ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I love the padded ear pieces and works great while I still have my glasses on. Other headphones don't fit right and press against my glasses which resulted in a bad headache. These don't do that. Besides, they're purple! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought these less then 2 months ago, and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these less then 2 months ago, and they are already not working properly. The sound cuts in and out while I'm running so that I can't actually hear the music, it usually happens after I've been running (and sweating) for about 15 minutes. The headphones are advertised as exercise/running headphones, so it doesn't make sense to me that the sweat would make them stop working. Anyhow, missed the window to return them so I"m just stuck with a product that is faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for kids (and big enough for mom's big head!)
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, and substantial coverage over kid's ears. Great set of headphones, when your little one's headphones are a tad too small. Nice long cord as well. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I’m a second grade teacher and I have a classroom set of these headphones. They work great for my students to listen to their iPad as well as record themselves during various assignments. They’re very durable even with 7 year olds using them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Ryse

customer_reviews.title: Seem durable look cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son at school for classroom as they were on the “school list” so far so good he loves the colors and they have made it through the year
customer_reviews.author: Jack Schirtz

customer_reviews.title: I loved so much that I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.text: Recently, the headphone cushion came off, and I was able to take apart and reassemble the cushion without any stress on the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: I-love-2-read

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought on a whim as a Christmas present last year for my brother and my Mom was telling me the other day that he liked them so much she bought another pair. Apparently they have a mic and work great for gaming. Score for big sis!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Jack part busted off!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the headphone back in March, then 2 days ago the tip of the jack busted off inside the headphones insert. Now his $120 kindle won't play sound and we can't get the tip out, and his headphones are broken too! Not happy :(
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: These headphones don't last long, this is the second pair that I have and the cushion has come off and it can't be put back on
customer_reviews.author: Tawana Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not For School Use
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write reviews, but I am so annoyed that I am compelled to do so. I bought multiple sets of these headphones for my classroom for my 1st graders to use when using iPads. The headphones are attractive and comfortable, but they are VERY poorly made! Almost every single set had one or both of the cushions fall off, just with normal use. I tried to glue them back on, but they fell off again. They are poorly made, and I am disappointed in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Nice for adult male
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my husband for Christmas and he says they are very comfortable and the sound is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: K Lynn

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 6 yr old and he loves them. They work perfectly and I like that the cord is tangle free!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruyts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound is really awesome and the nylon chord keeps me from chewing on it (I've had an oral fixation since I was a kid so nylon chords are a life saver). They arrived quickly and are super comfortable on my ears, usually headphones like these will give me headphones after I wear them for too long but these ones are absolutely perfect! I would highly recommend these and will probably buy them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my14-year old daughter for Christmas and they are already broken. One headphone no longer works. She takes good care of them too, so I assume it is a defect. They should have lasted longer than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Adearden

customer_reviews.title: Very long cord
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my preteen recently. They look exactly like the pictures, and are sturdy. I tried them out the first night just to check the quality, and the sound is amazing! The one problem my son and I both had was that the cord is unnecessarily long. When he attached them to his phone and put the phone in his pocket, the cord reached down to his knees! Other than that, it's a great set of headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great buy...both my daughter and I have a pair....lol....yes I have a pair... great quality and I love the colors...the things I like most are the cord is tangle free and they are foldable....will recommend these to others!
customer_reviews.author: shawntale

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are not heavy around my head and good sound. I also like the cord from headphones to plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely impressed
customer_reviews.text: The color is adorable. Sound surprised me as for the price they were very clear and the volume control was great. They feel strong and the cord is nice and long. The headphones fold up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: HouseOfPink

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Has worked for a while nothing has broken Highly recommended !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old daughter used these for her first plane trip, she really loves the color and they seem the stay on her well. She watched movies from the Ipad. She isn't too concerned about sound quality so I cant speak to that. I listened to them and it seemed fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My daughter is in virtual school and she loves it. They are comfy and the sound quality is amazing. It suits an adult and child.
customer_reviews.author: Riess

customer_reviews.title: They break easily
customer_reviews.text: We have now purchased these twice, but the earpiece continues to easily break off. They are not made to withstand regular use of an elementary aged child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Earpieces are too small & cause pain.
customer_reviews.text: The earpieces are small and round. They wouldn't even fit over a child's ear. They cause pressure on the ridges of the ear and do not block out surrounding noise. Will return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a child and they really fold easily. The "headband" part is padded which my daughter loved because it's softer than most other plastic headphones. Sound is clear and so far, they're pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: AlliBman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped
customer_reviews.text: These were actually for my son while he did stuff in the computer. They are awesome. Really comfortable and the only thing I hear is him lol
customer_reviews.author: SnickerDoodle

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: These headphone, strangely, broke right after one year from buying them as soon as the warranty expired. Furthermore, before the end of the year warranty, the wire to the left ear cut out and I was only able to hear on one side. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Kh Yako

customer_reviews.title: Broke After 1 Month
customer_reviews.text: You can hear any music or background sounds but you can't hear people talking. Super bummed that they already broke after only using for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Meyer

customer_reviews.title: The cord is fabric covered which is nice and they are padded for comfort
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these. The cord is fabric covered which is nice and they are padded for comfort. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't Last
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this pair twice. They only last about 8 months. Other than that, they work great for my daughter who wears them regularly on her Kindle Fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent at blocking out noise
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent at blocking out noise. I can vacuum, grade tests, run and listen to music at a normal volume. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Serhiy D

customer_reviews.title: Accident turned into reward!
customer_reviews.text: My lil guy accidentally ordered these online for himself. Hahah. He's paying them off with his weekly allowance very slowly, now. Hahah I have to admit, though, that they were too nice to return. I was actually quite pleased with them, so we worked out the deal that he can pay mom back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality product and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones with a radio while I am working on my computer. They are quite nice!
customer_reviews.author: Baxter22

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I can’t wear EarPods, need a cushioned earphone and have a small head. I ended up using these connected to my eye phone. After 10 days, the sound barely came through. Quality of this product was poor. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: Microphone stopped working in two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Got these head phones on Dec 1st and already the microphone has completely stopped working. Very disappointed. However, the sound quality is amazing. I don't recall reading anything about any claims on noise cancellation but they don't seem to cancel out any background noise. I. I bought these as a birthday gift and really wish they would've turned out better.
customer_reviews.author: Anaya Love

customer_reviews.title: Good sound canceling and good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I can wear these and so can my 4 year old. Cute colors. Good sound canceling and good sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Only used a handful of times and the muff padding fell off on one side. Unable to put back on. UPDATE: Customer service reached out to me after seeing my review above and sent me a new pair free of charge, they are working great and my son loves them. thanks so much for your great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Christina J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: This is a good set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: We've had them over a year with no issues - my 1- year old uses them all of the time
customer_reviews.author: David KenneyTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for any age.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color I choose and the quality of the product (great noise reduction). It was adaptable to fit my head & fit the port on my android phone, IPAD, & tablet and that was a plus that was unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: COLORS AND FIT ARE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: THESE WERE A GIFT FOR GRANDCHILD AND PER THE PARENTS, THEY ARE WORKING GREAT. SO FAR I WOULD RECOMMEND THEM AND NEXT TIME I AM WITH THEM I WILL LISTEN FOR MYSELF TO SEE HOW GOOD THEY LOOK, FEEL AND SOUND.
customer_reviews.author: Janet F

customer_reviews.title: Lemon headphones
customer_reviews.text: When I received phones I was delighted how comfortable the phone was and the cord was cloth so I assume it was durable. Cause I been very hard on my prior headphones. So today it completely stop working. Like literally one second I was walking listening to music the next none thing. I took the headphones off and on none thing. There was no cut on the wires tho it was curl up. There was no reason it stop working. So after one week it was done. Would not recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my granddaughters birthday. She loves them. Good fit and she can hear what she's listening too without outside noise. Planning on buying 2 more for Christmas gifts !
customer_reviews.author: Pennie Burkey

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 sets of these. They sound good and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect for a 9yr old, and sounds good too!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect for a 9yr old, and sounds good too! The other kids are jealous as the headphones have a very cool Matte finish that looks great in orange.
customer_reviews.author: Goroad1

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, in two different colors. Good value for the money. And the grandkids sure do like them.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I had originally purchased a different brand but had to return after a couple of months due to a defect. This pair is great! So comfortable and so affordable! Now, my other kids want a pair! We will definitely purchase more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: S.Young

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Broke after only a few months and did not work for my 8yr old. Ended up giving to a neighbor kid who is 4.
customer_reviews.author: S.Amis

product_meta.title: Artix Foldable On-Ear Adjustable Tangle-Free Wired Headphones, Compact Stereo Earphones with in-line Microphone and Controls for Children &Teen Head Phones for Sport, Travel, School - Pink
feature_bullets: ENHANCED PREMIUM HIGH-QUALITY SOUND AND DURABLE BUILD: Crisp, clear acoustics and deep bass provide a surround sound, balanced listening experience for all kinds of music.

LIGHTWEIGHT, FOLDABLE, AND ADJUSTABLE: Designed with comfort in mind, pillow soft cushion earpads sit snuggle on your ears making them ideal for long term usage- no need to worry about ear fatigue. Adjustable padded headband ensures a custom and perfect fit to your head. Conveniently foldable ear phones for portability and easy on the go storage.

BUILT IN MIC AND CONTROL: Enjoy a hands-free listening experience with in-line microphone built into the headset for high definition phone calls; Pause/Play music or Answer/End calls on your head phones with added control button

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: Built with a standard 3.5mm audio jack, ARTIX headphones are suitable for listening to music or audiobooks and watching videos! Works with most smartphones, computers, laptops, tablets, mp3 players and more. Perfect for iPhone, iPad, Samsung, Android, Kindle, Mac, PC
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We offer a 1-year hassle free limited warranty and friendly US based customer support on the ARTIX Foldable Head Phones
